title: Use a reusable water bottle
description: Carry your water bottle today instead of buying plastic bottles.

title: Walk or bike instead of driving
description: Choose walking or cycling for at least one short trip today.

title: Turn off lights when leaving a room
description: Save electricity by turning off unused lights.

title: Unplug devices when not in use
description: Prevent energy waste by unplugging chargers and appliances.

title: Bring a reusable shopping bag
description: Avoid single-use plastic bags while shopping.

title: Recycle correctly
description: Sort plastic, glass, and paper into the correct recycling bins.

title: Take a shorter shower
description: Reduce shower time to under 5 minutes.

title: Use a cloth napkin instead of paper
description: Reduce paper waste by using reusable napkins.

title: Compost food scraps
description: Turn organic waste into compost instead of throwing it away.

title: Use a metal straw instead of plastic
description: Avoid single-use plastic straws for your drinks today.

title: Donate old clothes
description: Give away clothes you no longer wear instead of discarding them.

title: Eat a meat-free meal
description: Try a vegetarian or vegan meal to reduce carbon footprint.

title: Pick up 5 pieces of litter
description: Help clean your local environment by picking up trash.

title: Use natural light instead of electric lights
description: Save electricity by relying on daylight when possible.

title: Reduce AC/heating usage for one hour
description: Lower energy consumption by adjusting temperature for an hour.

title: Buy locally grown food
description: Support local farmers and reduce transportation emissions.

title: Plant a seed or small plant
description: Grow something today to improve air quality and green your space.

title: Repair something instead of discarding it
description: Extend the life of an item by fixing it rather than throwing it away.

title: Take public transport instead of driving
description: Reduce your carbon footprint by using buses or trains.

title: Share an eco-friendly tip with someone
description: Encourage others to adopt sustainable habits.
